entries.task08_journal_entry_description: You found a sample of some kind.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: You found a corpse and a datapad with a message, apparently to you.  You need more information and hopefully your contact has something for you.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Someone killed Moxxar Krieg before you could talk to him.  A datapad was laying on the corpse with a message addressed to you.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Talk to Moxxar Krieg about the spice sample.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Doctor Edvar Vang should be able to analyze the spice sample and give you information.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Bring the locked datapad and the sample of spice back to Jevan Monsul.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Search around the crash site for some kind of information.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Go to the coordinates on Rori
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to (0, 2012) on Rori and find out what happened to the missing pilot.
entries.journal_entry_description: A pilot is lost.  Find out what happened and what he was transporting.
